description: This file implements core Netlink communication functionalities including serialization, deserialization, sending, and receiving messages over Netlink sockets. It includes mechanisms for managing message sequences, handling multiple pending requests, and debugging frame data. It also defines classes and methods for interacting with Linux rtnetlink subsystem, facilitating network configuration and management.

classes.name: Netlink
classes.description: Class responsible for serializing and deserializing Netlink messages, maintaining message sequence IDs.

classes.name: SocketNetlink
classes.description: Derived class that manages sending and receiving Netlink messages through sockets, including pending message queues.

methods.name: Netlink::Serialize
methods.description: Serializes Netlink message into a byte stream for transmission.

methods.name: Netlink::Deserialize
methods.description: Parses incoming byte stream to reconstruct Netlink messages.

methods.name: SocketNetlink::Send
methods.description: Sends a Netlink message, waits for response or timeout.

methods.name: SocketNetlink::Exchange
methods.description: Sends a message and waits for a corresponding response frame.

methods.name: SocketNetlink::SendData
methods.description: Retrieves pending Netlink message to send over socket.

methods.name: SocketNetlink::ReceiveData
methods.description: Processes incoming socket data to update pending requests or parse incoming frames.

methods.name: uint16_t Deserialize(const uint8_t stream[],const uint16_t streamLength)
void DumpFrame(const TCHAR prefix[],const uint8_t frame[],const uint16_t length)
uint32_t Exchange(const Core::Netlink & outbound,Core::Netlink & inbound,const uint32_t waitTime)
uint32_t Send(const Core::Netlink & outbound,const uint32_t waitTime)
uint16_t Serialize(uint8_t stream[],const uint16_t length) const

ctags.name: Deserialize
ctags.pattern: /^    uint16_t Netlink::Deserialize(const uint8_t stream[], const uint16_t streamLength)$/

ctags.pattern: /^    static void DumpFrame(const TCHAR prefix[], const uint8_t frame[], const uint16_t length)$/
ctags.signature: (const TCHAR prefix[],const uint8_t frame[],const uint16_t length)
